name: New Physics of Olix
description: A Java based 2D physics platformer game
breakDown: Used proper Object Oriented techniques to create a large Java application.
Created game from the ground up, implementing real world physics.

name: Sudoku Solver
description: A Java application to solve any sudoku puzzle using real sudoku strategies
breakDown: Researched and implemented real Sudoku techniques in an efficient manner.

name: SOEN Schedule Builder
description: A web application to generate schedules for SOEN students given a set of preferences. A heavy focus on documentation in this course
